name: Uchūsen: Ultimate Ploid Battle
overview: Uchūsen is a video game designed and programmed by Napoleón Malpica from NAPE GAMES  and Manu Segura from 1985 ALTERNATIVO for 1 day in an internal GameJam at the Fnac'n Pixels 2019 event.  In Uchūsen you control the ship Kairos, designed with high technology to fight against the alien invasion Uchūsen. Your goal is to open up between the enemy base and end the invasion to win the intergalactic war.  Do you have all the necessary reflexes to control Kairos and open yourself up in the enemy base?
